g.style: box-sizing: content-box; position: absolute; left: 0px; shape-rendering: geometricprecision; pointer-events: none;

path.style: stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(200, 200, 200); fill-opacity: 0.3; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;
stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(200, 200, 200); fill-opacity: 0.3; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;

stroke: rgb(68, 68, 68); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(200, 200, 200); fill-opacity: 0.3; stroke-width: 0; opacity: 1;

rect.style: stroke-width: 1.5; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 1; fill: rgb(52, 152, 219); fill-opacity: 1;

text.style: cursor: default; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 28px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; text-shadow: rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px 1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) 1px -1px 1px, rgb(255, 255, 255) -1px 1px 1px; white-space: pre;

opacity: 1; font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 36px; fill: rgb(44, 62, 80); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

g.text: China's Four Global Initiatives: Strategy → Mechanisms → Goals

rect.style: stroke-width: 1px; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 0; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 30px; fill: rgb(52, 152, 219); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;

rect.style: stroke-width: 1px; stroke: rgb(0, 0, 0); stroke-opacity: 0; fill: rgb(0, 0, 0); fill-opacity: 0;

text.style: font-family: Arial, sans-serif; font-size: 30px; fill: rgb(243, 156, 18); fill-opacity: 1; white-space: pre;
